mapper.select: select gcode from guardian where memid=#{memid}

select * from kindergarten
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinkindcode=#{kinkindcode}
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinkindcode=#{kinkindcode} and kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%')
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%')
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} order by kinkindcode
select kinname,kinaddress from kindergarten where kincode=#{kincode}
select cname from children where ccode=#{ccode}
select count(*) from enroll where ccode=#{ccode}
select count(*) from enroll where ccode=#{ccode} and kincode=#{kincode}
select encode,statcode,date_add(enlog,interval +7 day) enlog from enroll where ccode=#{ccode} and kincode=#{kincode}

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,e.hopedate,e.enlog,s.status from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} order by e.encode

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,k.kincode,e.hopedate,c.crank,s.status,date_add(e.enlog,interval +7 day) enlog from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and (e.statcode<5 or e.statcode=8)

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,e.hopedate,s.status from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and (e.statcode=5 or e.statcode=6)

SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, encode,cname,crank,enlog FROM (SELECT e.encode,c.cname,c.crank,e.enlog FROM enroll e,children c,kindergarten k where e.ccode=c.ccode and e.kincode=k.kincode and (e.statcode<5 or e.statcode=8) and k.kincode=#{kincode} order by crank desc,enlog ) t, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,e.hopedate,e.enlog,s.status from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and e.statcode=7
mapper.update: update enroll set statcode=8 where encode=#{encode}
mapper.select: SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, encode,cname,hopedate,crank,en,status,ccode FROM (SELECT e.encode,c.cname,e.hopedate,c.crank,date_add(e.enlog,interval +7 day) en,s.status,c.ccode FROM enroll e,children c,status_code s,kindergarten k where e.ccode=c.ccode and e.statcode=s.statcode and k.kincode=e.kincode and k.kincode=#{kincode} and (s.statcode<5 or s.statcode=8) order by c.crank desc,e.enlog ) t, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R
mapper.update: update enroll set statcode=#{statcode} where encode=#{encode}
